short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So those bastards blocked the body scroll? No problem, click the button or add blacklists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So those bastards blocked the body scroll? No problem, enable scroll overflow by clicking the button or add a domain to the list so it works by default
